On Tue, Feb 17, 2009 at 1:23 PM, yme0987654321 <yme0987654321@...> wrote:
> Hi David,
>
> My name is Yishai (I have to figure out how to change this Yahoo
> profile). Anyway, I guess the issue is that I have many tests that are
> in the 3.8 style that I am retrofitting, so to use this I would have
> to change the test into a Junit 4 type test, whereas in my hack the
> runner correctly figured out that it was a JUnit 3.8 style test.

Have you considered converting the tests to Junit 4? I'm sure if you
ask around some has implemented a script to get most of the monkey
work done.

Cheers
Mark
